title: Pyright Language Server Configuration
description: Pyright Configuration Schema. Patterns modified to allow empty, added title, #/definitions/diagnostic simplified; title â†’ description. Distributed under MIT License, Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.

include.description: Files and directories included in type analysis

items.description: File or directory to include in type analysis

exclude.description: Files and directories excluded from type analysis

items.description: File or directory to exclude from type analysis

ignore.description: Files and directories whose diagnostics are suppressed

items.description: File or directory where diagnostics should be suppressed

strict.description: Files and directories that should use 'strict' type checking rules

items.description: File or directory that should use 'strict' type checking rules

defineConstant.description: Identifiers that should be treated as constants

typeCheckingMode.description: Specifies the default rule set to use for type checking

useLibraryCodeForTypes.description: Use library implementations to extract type information when type stub is not present

typeshedPath.description: Path to directory containing typeshed type stub files

stubPath.description: Path to directory containing custom type stub files

strictListInference.description: Infer strict types for list expressions

strictSetInference.description: Infer strict types for set expressions

strictDictionaryInference.description: Infer strict types for dictionary expressions

strictParameterNoneValue.description: Allow implicit Optional when default parameter value is None

reportGeneralTypeIssues.description: Controls reporting of general type issues

reportPropertyTypeMismatch.description: Controls reporting of property getter/setter type mismatches

reportFunctionMemberAccess.description: Controls reporting of member accesses on function objects

reportMissingImports.description: Controls reporting of imports that cannot be resolved

reportMissingModuleSource.description: Controls reporting of imports that cannot be resolved to source files

reportMissingTypeStubs.description: Controls reporting of imports that cannot be resolved to type stub files

reportImportCycles.description: Controls reporting of module imports that create cycles in import graph

reportUnusedImport.description: Controls reporting of imported symbols that are not referenced within the source file

reportUnusedClass.description: Controls reporting of private classes that are not accessed

reportUnusedFunction.description: Controls reporting of private functions or methods that are not accessed

reportUnusedVariable.description: Controls reporting of local variables that are not accessed

reportDuplicateImport.description: Controls reporting of symbols or modules that are imported more than once

reportWildcardImportFromLibrary.description: Controls reporting of wlidcard import from external library

reportOptionalSubscript.description: Controls reporting of attempts to subscript (index) a variable with Optional type

reportOptionalMemberAccess.description: Controls reporting of attempts to access a member of a variable with Optional type

reportOptionalCall.description: Controls reporting of attempts to call a variable with Optional type

reportOptionalIterable.description: Controls reporting of attempts to use an Optional type as an iterable value

reportOptionalContextManager.description: Controls reporting of attempts to use an Optional type as a parameter to a with statement

reportOptionalOperand.description: Controls reporting of attempts to use an Optional type as an operand for a binary or unary operator

reportTypedDictNotRequiredAccess.description: Controls reporting of attempts to access a non-required key in a TypedDict without a check for its presence

reportUntypedFunctionDecorator.description: Controls reporting of function decorators without type annotations, which obscure function types

reportUntypedClassDecorator.description: Controls reporting of class decorators without type annotations, which obscure class types

reportUntypedBaseClass.description: Controls reporting of a base class of an unknown type, which obscures most type checking for the class

reportUntypedNamedTuple.description: Controls reporting of a named tuple definition that does not contain type information

reportPrivateUsage.description: Controls reporting of private variables and functions used outside of the owning class or module and usage of protected members outside of subclasses

reportTypeCommentUsage.description: Controls reporting of deprecated type comment usage

reportPrivateImportUsage.description: Controls reporting of improper usage of symbol imported from a "py.typed" module that is not re-exported from that module

reportConstantRedefinition.description: Controls reporting of attempts to redefine variables that are in all-caps

reportIncompatibleMethodOverride.description: Controls reporting of method overrides in subclasses that redefine the method in an incompatible way

reportIncompatibleVariableOverride.description: Controls reporting of overrides in subclasses that redefine a variable in an incompatible way

reportInconsistentConstructor.description: Controls reporting of __init__ and __new__ methods whose signatures are inconsistent

reportOverlappingOverload.description: Controls reporting of function overloads that overlap in signature and obscure each other or do not agree on return type

reportMissingSuperCall.description: Controls reporting of missing call to parent class for inherited `__init__` methods

reportUninitializedInstanceVariable.description: Controls reporting of instance variables that are not initialized in the constructor

reportInvalidStringEscapeSequence.description: Controls reporting of invalid escape sequences used within string literals

reportUnknownParameterType.description: Controls reporting input and return parameters whose types are unknown

reportUnknownArgumentType.description: Controls reporting argument expressions whose types are unknown

reportUnknownLambdaType.description: Controls reporting input and return parameters for lambdas whose types are unknown

reportUnknownVariableType.description: Controls reporting local variables whose types are unknown

reportUnknownMemberType.description: Controls reporting class and instance variables whose types are unknown

reportMissingParameterType.description: Controls reporting input parameters that are missing a type annotation

reportMissingTypeArgument.description: Controls reporting generic class reference with missing type arguments

reportInvalidTypeVarUse.description: Controls reporting improper use of type variables within function signatures

reportCallInDefaultInitializer.description: Controls reporting usage of function calls within a default value initializer expression

reportUnnecessaryIsInstance.description: Controls reporting calls to 'isinstance' or 'issubclass' where the result is statically determined to be always true

reportUnnecessaryCast.description: Controls reporting calls to 'cast' that are unnecessary

reportUnnecessaryComparison.description: Controls reporting the use of '==' or '!=' comparisons that are unnecessary

reportUnnecessaryContains.title: Controls reporting the use of 'in' operations that are unnecessary

reportAssertAlwaysTrue.description: Controls reporting assert expressions that will always evaluate to true

reportSelfClsParameterName.description: Controls reporting assert expressions that will always evaluate to true

reportImplicitStringConcatenation.description: Controls reporting usage of implicit concatenation of string literals

reportUnboundVariable.description: Controls reporting of attempts to use an unbound or possibly unbound variable

reportUndefinedVariable.description: Controls reporting of attempts to use an undefined variable

reportInvalidStubStatement.description: Controls reporting of type stub statements that do not conform to PEP 484

reportIncompleteStub.description: Controls reporting of incomplete type stubs that declare a module-level __getattr__ function

reportUnsupportedDunderAll.description: Controls reporting of unsupported operations performed on __all__

reportUnusedCallResult.description: Controls reporting of call expressions whose results are not consumed

reportUnusedCoroutine.description: Controls reporting of call expressions that returns Coroutine whose results are not consumed

reportUnusedExpression.description: Controls reporting of simple expressions whose value is not used in any way

reportUnnecessaryTypeIgnoreComment.description: Controls reporting of '# type: ignore' comments that have no effect'

reportMatchNotExhaustive.description: Controls reporting of 'match' statements that do not exhaustively match all possible values

pythonVersion.description: Python version to assume during type analysis

pythonPlatform.description: Python platform to assume during type analysis

venvPath.description: Path to directory containing a folder of virtual environments

venv.description: Name of virtual environment subdirectory within venvPath

executionEnvironments.description: Analysis settings to use for specified subdirectories of code

items.description: Analysis settings to use for specified subdirectories of code

root.description: Path to code subdirectory to which these settings apply

pythonVersion.description: Python version to assume during type analysis

pythonPlatform.description: Python platform to assume during type analysis
